channel.title: Apt-cacher-ng setup for Kicksecure templates?
channel.description:
Hello, I am planning on creating multiple Kicksecure templates in Qubes and would like to user apt-cacher. I will use this tutorial: (https://)github(.com)/unman/notes/blob/master/apt-cacher-ng.md (can't add links)
Is there any documentation for Kicksecure on how to change the apt-cacher configuration to allow it to work with tor-ified updates?
